Class MonthManager

public class MonthManager
extends Object

getLastMonths

public Month[] getLastMonths(int n)
Returns last N months in records. If n is greater than number of actual Months available, the maximum number of Months is returned.

Parameters:
n - number of months
Returns:
array of Months
